languages.text: "Дело не терпит отлагательств. С минуты на минуту на нижние палубы отправится спецотряд с приказом жестоко подавить забастовку рабочих. Но я уверена, что мера эта — неоправданная, и что сам кризис вызван... действиями одного из старших офицеров". {n}Лейтенант едва ли не дрожит от напряжения, произнося свою речь. Она очень бледна.{/n}

"This matter cannot wait. Any minute now, an assault unit will be dispatched to the lower decks on orders to crush the workers' strike by any means necessary. But I am convinced that this step is unwarranted, and that the crisis itself was provoked... by the actions of one of the senior officers." {n}Vent is almost trembling with tension as she delivers her speech, her face extremely pale.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Дело не терпит отлагательств. С минуты на минуту на нижние палубы отправится спецотряд с приказом жестоко подавить забастовку рабочих. Но я уверена, что мера эта — неоправданная, и что сам кризис вызван... действиями одного из старших офицеров". {n}Лейтенант едва ли не дрожит от напряжения, произнося свою речь. Она очень бледна.{/n}

But I am convinced that this step is unwarranted, and that the crisis itself was provoked... by the actions of one of the senior officers." {n}Vent is almost trembling with tension as she delivers her speech, her face extremely pale.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "This matter cannot wait. Any minute now, an assault unit will be dispatched to the lower decks on orders to crush the workers' strike by any means necessary. But I am convinced that this step is unwarranted, and that the crisis itself was provoked... by the actions of one of the senior officers." {n}Vent is almost trembling with tension as she delivers her speech, her face extremely pale.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: “这件事情不能再等下去了。现在随时可能会有一支突击队前往底层甲板，采取一切必要手段，粉碎工人挑起的罢工活动。但我相信，事情没必要闹到这一步，这场事故原本就是……某位高级军官挑起来的。”{n}温特说出这些话的时候紧张得几乎浑身发抖，脸色惨白如纸。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This matter cannot wait. Any minute now, an assault unit will be dispatched to the lower decks on orders to crush the workers' strike by any means necessary. But I am convinced that this step is unwarranted, and that the crisis itself was provoked... by the actions of one of the senior officers." {n}Vent is almost trembling with tension as she delivers her speech, her face extremely pale.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这件事情不能再等下去了。现在随时可能会有一支突击队前往底层甲板，采取一切必要手段，粉碎工人挑起的罢工活动。但我相信，事情没必要闹到这一步，这场事故原本就是……某位高级军官挑起来的。”{n}温特说出这些话的时候紧张得几乎浑身发抖，脸色惨白如纸。{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: «Este asunto no puede esperar. En cualquier momento, se enviará una unidad de asalto a las cubiertas inferiores para imponer el orden y aplastar la huelga por todos los medios. Pero creo firmemente que esta medida no es necesaria y que la crisis en sí ha sido provocada... por las acciones de uno de los oficiales de mayor rango». {n}La tensión hace que Vent prácticamente tiemble al hablar y su cara es extremadamente pálida.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This matter cannot wait. Any minute now, an assault unit will be dispatched to the lower decks on orders to crush the workers' strike by any means necessary. But I am convinced that this step is unwarranted, and that the crisis itself was provoked... by the actions of one of the senior officers." {n}Vent is almost trembling with tension as she delivers her speech, her face extremely pale.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Este asunto no puede esperar. En cualquier momento, se enviará una unidad de asalto a las cubiertas inferiores para imponer el orden y aplastar la huelga por todos los medios. Pero creo firmemente que esta medida no es necesaria y que la crisis en sí ha sido provocada... por las acciones de uno de los oficiales de mayor rango». {n}La tensión hace que Vent prácticamente tiemble al hablar y su cara es extremadamente pálida.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: 「この問題に時間の猶予はありません。今にも突撃部隊が下層デッキに派遣され、あらゆる手段で労働者のストライキを鎮圧するよう命じられるでしょう。ですが、私はこの措置が不当であり、この危機自体が上級士官の一人の行動によって引き起こされたものであると思っているのです」{n}ヴェントは緊張に震え、顔を真っ青にしながらも話を続けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This matter cannot wait. Any minute now, an assault unit will be dispatched to the lower decks on orders to crush the workers' strike by any means necessary. But I am convinced that this step is unwarranted, and that the crisis itself was provoked... by the actions of one of the senior officers." {n}Vent is almost trembling with tension as she delivers her speech, her face extremely pale.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この問題に時間の猶予はありません。今にも突撃部隊が下層デッキに派遣され、あらゆる手段で労働者のストライキを鎮圧するよう命じられるでしょう。ですが、私はこの措置が不当であり、この危機自体が上級士官の一人の行動によって引き起こされたものであると思っているのです」{n}ヴェントは緊張に震え、顔を真っ青にしながらも話を続けた。{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Diese Angelegenheit kann nicht warten. Es wird jeden Augenblick eine Sturmeinheit auf die Unterdecks geschickt, um den Streik der Arbeiter mit allen Mitteln niederzuschlagen. Ich bin jedoch überzeugt, dass dieser Schritt unnötig ist und dass die Krise selbst überhaupt nur ... durch das Handeln eines der ranghohen Offiziere ausgelöst wurde." {n}Vent zittert fast vor Anspannung, während sie spricht. Ihr Gesicht ist extrem bleich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This matter cannot wait. Any minute now, an assault unit will be dispatched to the lower decks on orders to crush the workers' strike by any means necessary. But I am convinced that this step is unwarranted, and that the crisis itself was provoked... by the actions of one of the senior officers." {n}Vent is almost trembling with tension as she delivers her speech, her face extremely pale.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese Angelegenheit kann nicht warten. Es wird jeden Augenblick eine Sturmeinheit auf die Unterdecks geschickt, um den Streik der Arbeiter mit allen Mitteln niederzuschlagen. Ich bin jedoch überzeugt, dass dieser Schritt unnötig ist und dass die Krise selbst überhaupt nur ... durch das Handeln eines der ranghohen Offiziere ausgelöst wurde." {n}Vent zittert fast vor Anspannung, während sie spricht. Ihr Gesicht ist extrem bleich.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: « Il faut intervenir au plus vite. À l'heure où nous parlons, un escadron d'assaut s'apprête à faire une descente dans les ponts inférieurs pour réprimer le mouvement de grève par tous les moyens nécessaires. Pour ma part, je suis convaincue qu'il est inutile d'en arriver là et que cette crise découle directement des... agissements d'un des officiers supérieurs. » {n}La voix de Vent frémit de tension contenue, et son visage est d'une pâleur mortelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This matter cannot wait. Any minute now, an assault unit will be dispatched to the lower decks on orders to crush the workers' strike by any means necessary. But I am convinced that this step is unwarranted, and that the crisis itself was provoked... by the actions of one of the senior officers." {n}Vent is almost trembling with tension as she delivers her speech, her face extremely pale.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il faut intervenir au plus vite. À l'heure où nous parlons, un escadron d'assaut s'apprête à faire une descente dans les ponts inférieurs pour réprimer le mouvement de grève par tous les moyens nécessaires. Pour ma part, je suis convaincue qu'il est inutile d'en arriver là et que cette crise découle directement des... agissements d'un des officiers supérieurs. » {n}La voix de Vent frémit de tension contenue, et son visage est d'une pâleur mortelle.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "İvedilikle çözüme kavuşturulması gereken bir mesele var. Alt güvertede konuşlanmış bir taarruz birimi, ne pahasına olursa olsun işçi grevini bastırmakla görevlendirildi. Fakat buna lüzum olmadığına, krizin provokasyon sonucu çıktığına ve... Bu provokasyonun, kıdemli subaylardan birinin eylemleri sonucu meydana geldiğine inanıyorum." {n}Vent, konuşmasını yaparken gerginlikten âdeta titriyor. Yüzüyse kireç kesilmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This matter cannot wait. Any minute now, an assault unit will be dispatched to the lower decks on orders to crush the workers' strike by any means necessary. But I am convinced that this step is unwarranted, and that the crisis itself was provoked... by the actions of one of the senior officers." {n}Vent is almost trembling with tension as she delivers her speech, her face extremely pale.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İvedilikle çözüme kavuşturulması gereken bir mesele var. Alt güvertede konuşlanmış bir taarruz birimi, ne pahasına olursa olsun işçi grevini bastırmakla görevlendirildi. Fakat buna lüzum olmadığına, krizin provokasyon sonucu çıktığına ve... Bu provokasyonun, bir kidemli subayın eylemleriyle meydana geldiğine inanıyorum. {n}Vent, konuşmasını yaparken gerginlikten âdeta titriyor. Yüzüyse kireç kesilmiş.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader
